Foodieco.name: Foodieco
Foodieco.point1: Developed an app that provides a full view of fridge items and suggests possible replacements for certain ingredients in a 4-people team.

Community Changemaker Challenge.name: Post-secondary Event Week
Community Changemaker Challenge.point1: Participated in a 1-month long project design challenge in a 4-people team.
Community Changemaker Challenge.point2: For students struggling to find post-secondary pathways, my team designed an event week with university program fairs, workplaces visits, and peer support.
Community Changemaker Challenge.point3: Was awarded Best Overall Project, Most Synchronized and Organized, and Strong Pitch.

StudySpace.name: StudySpace
StudySpace.point1: Developed a study assistant program with a stopwatch that measures  total study time, music/audio features to help with concentration, and a checklist feature.
StudySpace.point2: Built in Processing (a graphical library that uses Java as its primary language) using OOP in a 3-people team.

Body In Depth.name: Body In Depth
Body In Depth.point1: Engineered a body composition analysis calculator that plans out a dietary plan for weight loss/gain.
Body In Depth.point2: Built with Processing, a graphical library that uses Java as its primary language using object-oriented programming (OOP).
Body In Depth.point3: Worked alone as a full-stack developer.

ReadBetter.name: ReadBetter
ReadBetter.point1: Developed a Flask application to assist people in reading by providing artificial fixation points, using integrations of assemblyai, pypdf2, and EasyOCR.
ReadBetter.point2: Observed a decrease in the total reading time by approximately 35% from a reading efficiency experiment.

AppMatch Maker.name: AppMatch Maker
AppMatch Maker.role: Project Manager, Developer in a Team of 5
AppMatch Maker.point1: Used MS Forms, PowerBI, Power Automate, and Dataverse to develop a software prototype that scans technology landscape across the Ontario Public Service and finds opportunities to reuse existing applications.
AppMatch Maker.point2: Estimated to reduce time, resources, and finances taken towards building a new IT solution every time by 30%.
AppMatch Maker.point3: Prepared and delivered the pitch that included problem statement, busines impact, target users, solution, technology stack, and solution roadmap for the future.

Client Feedback Portal, Towing and Stora.name: Client Feedback Portal
Client Feedback Portal, Towing and Stora.point1: Engaged in developing the Client Feedback Portal for the Towing and Storage Oversight Application project (a complaint portal against overcharging towing and vehicle storage operators).
Client Feedback Portal, Towing and Stora.point2: Developed the user interface using Angular and made it compliant with Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA) using WAVE evaluation tool and NVDA speech viewer.
Client Feedback Portal, Towing and Stora.point3: Participated in backend development by writing functions that organize filed complaints into pdf files in database using Springboot.

Client Information Portal, Towing and St.name: Client Information Portal
Client Information Portal, Towing and St.point1: Engaged in developing the Client Information Portal Towing and Storage Oversight Application project (a complaint portal against overcharging towing and vehicle storage operators).
Client Information Portal, Towing and St.point2: Developed the user interface using Angular.
Client Information Portal, Towing and St.point3: Helped make the user interface compliant with Accessibility for Ontarioâ€™s with Disabilities Act (AODA) by making the website accessible with keyboard and speech-viewer.
